title: How to link local NPM library to another local project
content:
# How to link local NPM library to another local project
1. Link the project (i.e. `yarn link` or `npm link`. This will [[Symlink]] the project to the current node version’s global node_modules folder
	* If you use NVM, need to ensure the both projects are on the same node version, otherwise the symlink won’t work
